title: : Pretty Dang Quick Cinnamon Bread
directions: Grease 2 8″x 4 1/2 ” glass loaf pans and set aside
Dissolve yeast in warm water with a pinch of ginger added (it encourages the yeast to grow..little yeast cheerleaders)
Add buttermilk, 2 1/2 cups of the flour, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, sugar, baking powder and salt
Blend for 30 seconds with a mixer
Stir in remaining flour, keeping dough soft and slightly sticky
Remove from mixer bowl and knead for 5 minutes
Spread with half the melted butter and then half the brown sugar mixed with cinnamon
Roll the dough up from the long side
Pinch the edge to the loaf to seal the seam
Place seam side down in the pans
Bake loaves in a 375F oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until loaf sounds hollow when tapped
Let cool in pan for 10 minutes
Remove from pans and cool completely
